about_the_game:
Torchless is a dark and gothic dungeon crawler RPG played through a text-based retro console. Every choice matters and all choices available to you depend on your heroes, items, and the choices you've previously made along the way.
Experience a nostalgic throwback to the genre-defining classics such as Wizardry and Eye of the Beholder, with modern inspiration from games like Darkest Dungeon, Fear & Hunger, and Dungeon Encounters.

A hero enters the tavern

Forge your optimal party from a wide cast of heroes, each with their own unique capabilities, strengths, and weaknesses. No hero can do everything, but they all have their place in the dungeon. Finding party members that synergize well and support your style of play is the key to successful exploration.

Exploration of the depths

With your party complete, you prepare to set forth, for the dungeons on the west coast, in search of a worried mother's lost husband and daughter.
Explore the dungeon depths as you gather loot, manage your resources, and fight the horrors that lurk beneath.
Your party must succeed, no matter the cost.

Key features

  • Oppressive and hopeless atmosphere.
  • A wide variety of heroes and classes, each with unique stats, skills and art.
  • Merciless yet fair turn-based combat system.
  • Text-based command system where every action is taken through command prompts.
  • Hand-crafted retro sprite art inspired by classic dungeon crawlers such as Wizardry, Eye of the Beholder, and many more.
  • Numerous dungeon floors to explore with each hero impacting the way you navigate, making each playthrough a unique experience.
  • Rich storytelling reminiscent of Dungeons & Dragons campaigns, with plenty of characters to meet, items to find, and places to explore.

What will you do?

short_description: Torchless is a dark and gothic dungeon crawler RPG played through a text-based retro console. Forge your party and take up arms against the horrors lurking within the dungeon halls in strategic, turn-based combat, clinging on to survival using everything at your disposal.
